  • Method Details

    • likeUnlikeSong

      public boolean likeUnlikeSong(Song song)
      Toggles the 'like' status of a given song. If the song is already liked (present in favoriteSongs) it is unliked (removed from favoriteSongs) and its like count is decremented. If the song is not liked, it is added to favoriteSongs and its like count is incremented.
      Parameters:
      song - The song to like or unlike.
      Returns:
      true if the song was liked (added to favoriteSongs) as a result of this operation, false if the song was unliked (removed from favoriteSongs).

    • followUnfollowPlaylist

      public boolean followUnfollowPlaylist(Playlist playlist)
      Toggles the 'follow' status of a given playlist. If the playlist is already followed (present in followedPlaylists), t is unfollowed (removed from followedPlaylists) and its i follower count is decremented. If the playlist is not followed, it is added to followedPlaylists and its follower count is incremented.
      Parameters:
      playlist - The playlist to follow or unfollow.
      Returns:
      true if the playlist was followed (added to followedPlaylists) as a result of this operation, false if the playlist was unfollowed (removed from followedPlaylists).

    • getPlaylistsOwnedByUser

      public List<Playlist> getPlaylistsOwnedByUser(List<Playlist> allPlaylists)
      Retrieves a list of playlists owned by the user. It filters through all provided playlists and returns only those where the owner matches the current user's username.
      Parameters:
      allPlaylists - A list of all playlists to filter through.
      Returns:
      A list of Playlist objects that are owned by the user.

    • switchConnectionStatus

      public void switchConnectionStatus(int currentTimestamp)
      Switches the online status of the user.
      Parameters:
      currentTimestamp - The current timestamp for updating pause start time.

    • getOnline

      public boolean getOnline()
      Gets the online status of the user.
      Returns:
      true if the user is online, false if the user is offline.

    • addUser

      public void addUser(Library library)
      Adds the user to the specified library. The implementation of this method depends on the specific user type (e.g., NormalUser, Artist, Host) and their interactions with the library.
      Specified by:
      addUser in class User
      Parameters:
      library - The library to which the user is added.

    • handleDeletion

      public boolean handleDeletion(Library library)
      Handles the deletion of the user's account from the library. Checks for user interactions with the user's content before deletion.
      Specified by:
      handleDeletion in class User
      Parameters:
      library - The library from which the user's account is deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the user's account was successfully deleted, false otherwise.
